Director: Alexander Askol'dov

Cast: Nonna Mordjukova, Rolan Bykov, Raisa Nedashkovskaya, Lyudmila Volyn, Basil SHukshin, Love Katz, Paul Levine, Dmitry Kleiman, Martha Bratkova, Igor Fishman, Otar Koberidze, Victor Shahs, Sergey Nikonenko Leonid Reutov, Semyon Morozov

Description: In the midst of civil war, when the Red Army occupied a small Southern town, the commissioner of the Vavilov settles into a large Jewish family to have a baby. Vavilov was accustomed to the rigors of military life male. It would seem that it does not have anything feminine. Therefore pregnancy leads her to a horror. However, after the birth she gradually "melts", imbued with love for his son. But the cruel time dictates the cruel laws ...
